hail to dragon age XD
Does Hoye read with emotion and voices and stuff? I've already read the book, but I've always enjoyed having stuff read to me. Never stopped bein' a child :3

Unfortunately, the quality isn\'t good at all - with 96KB/s at 22khz in mono(!) that is no surprise.nOne bad thing is also, that every mp3 is around 4 minutes long, sometimes ending midwordish. There is no seperation in chapters, making the hearing experience extremely bad when you just want to listen to one chapter or just find a place where you can restart the next time without having to search for the correct timecode.

can someone seed this pls?
i get like,2kB...

thanks anyway ^^
Thank you. Played the game and have always wanted to read the books. I hope the quality is ok.
